mapper.select: SELECT qna_id, member_id, title, content, create_at FROM qna ORDER BY create_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (qna_category, title, content, is_secret, member_id, product_id) VALUES (#{qnaCategory}, #{title}, #{content}, #{isSecret}, #{memberId}, #{productId})
mapper.update: UPDATE qna SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, qna_category = #{qnaCategory}, is_secret = #{isSecret}, password = #{password} WHERE qna_id = #{qnaId}
